alert.note: Alert for Butler (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 14 at 5:23PM CDT until April 14 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BUTLER COUNTY... At 522 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Burns to 19 miles southeast of Florence to 14 miles northeast of El Dorado, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Burns and El Dorado Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
